Job Description:
Software Application Developer No. of Openings : Education : B.E(Any stream)/  B.Tech /  M.E /  M.Tech or similar. 
Job Requirements: 
• 3 to 5 years of experience in VB .Net application development SQL server. 
• Should work independently and complete assignments on time. 
• Must be a quick learner. 
• Should be open to travel/ relocate. 
• Should remain updated with current latest technologies. 
• Must have good analytical communication skills. 
• Microsoft Certification will be a plus. 
Responsibilities: 
• Do impact analysis and prepare design document for development. 
• Develop test the modules and prepare release for customer. 
• Provide necessary support to internal team ,  customer etc. 
• Perform data migration and deploy the application. 
• Prepare all necessary documentation and provide Training. 
• Closely work with BA ,  Testers and customer. 
• Must update the progress daily to Reporting manager. 
• Contribute to product continual improvement.
